hymn.title: I know that my Redeemer lives
hymn.chords: | C - G7 | C - G/D | C/E - F | G7 - - | C - G/B | Am - D | Em - D7 | G - G7 | C - F | C/E - F | Dm - C | G - G7/F | C/E - F/A | C/G - G7 | F/C - - | C - - |

layout.singingstanza: I know that my Re -- deem -- er lives And ev -- er prays for me; A tok -- en of His love He gives, A pledge of li -- ber -- ty.

lyrics.stanza: I know that my Redeemer lives And ever prays for me; A token of His love He gives, A pledge of liberty.
He wills that I should holy be: What can withstand His will? The counsel of His grace in me He surely shall fulfill.
Jesus, I hang upon Thy word: I steadfastly believe Thou wilt return and claim me, Lord, And to Thyself receive.
